title: Week Calculator - How many weeks between two dates?
text: Week Calculator to calculate the number of weeks between dates. Online weeks calculator to find how many weeks between two dates quickly and easily. You can enter any two dates, past, current or future to get the number of weeks between the dates. As soon as you enter or select the start date and end date, the week calculator will show you how many weeks and days between the two dates. There are many use cases for the week counter. One can use the week difference calculator as a count down to a birthdate, special day, holiday, or event. For example, if one wants to calculate how many more weeks to go before New Year's Day, he can enter today's date as the start date, and next year's New Year's Day as the end date, the week calculator will easily calculate how many weeks and days are in between. Another case is that one needs to schedule an appointment in the future from a future date, he can find how many weeks are left by using our week calculator to use as a countdown.
